testcase.classname: USGBC Leed Online - Registration for Campus
testcase.name: To verify the Leed online Login
testcase.system-out: Given User has to navigate to LEED Online login page........................passed And User has to enter username jaypeejay@hotmail.com and password initpass..passed And User has to check accept checkbox.......................................passed When User clicks on login button and navigate to home page..................passed Then User should navigate to Project Details Page...........................passed

testcase.classname: USGBC Leed Online - Registration for Campus
testcase.name: Create a campus for Leed online
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on registration page...................................passed And User has to select campus from the register dropdown....................passed And User has to verify campus registration..................................passed And User has to enter the Name TestProjectcampus12,Owner JOHN J NOLIS ARCHITECTURE AND INTERIORS and Owners Representative 123456789.passed And User has to select Owner type...........................................passed And User has to select owner country........................................passed And User has to enter email address testleed@campus.com.....................passed And User has to enter Address 795,Address E DRAGRAM and City TUCSON.........passed And User has to select Country..............................................passed And User has to select State................................................passed And User has to enter Postal code 98104.....................................passed When User clicks Continue button............................................passed Then User has filled the details successfully and should navigate to Agreement page.passed

testcase.classname: USGBC Leed Online - Registration for Campus
testcase.name: LEED certification agreement
testcase.system-out: Given User has to find LEED certification agreement.........................passed And User should find all the 29 list of points..............................passed When User wants to agree then user should click on I AGREE button...........passed Then User successfully registered project and user should navigate to payment page.passed
